column2: printer=[http://www.printedword.co.uk/ The Printed Word], Horsham, UK

column1: '''''Mallorn'' 53''' is the fifty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s biannual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)
column2: Mallorn]]'', published in Spring [[2012]]. This was the last issue to be published biannually; the journal returned to its annual format with [[Mallorn 54
column3: ''Mallorn'' 54]] coming out a year later in Spring [[2013]].

column2: ''Tolkien Studies: An Annual Scholarly Review'', Volume VIII 2011]]

** "Sought in translation": ''C.S. Lewis's Lost Aeneid: Arms and the Exile''
** "What made J.R.R. Tolkien tick and why was he called 'Reuel'? The importance of Tolkien biography"
** "From Dunne to Desmond: disembodied time travel in Tolkien, Stapledon and ''Lost''"
